resources.string:
!!! INSTRUCTIONS !!!


-> Enter the Details of ONE member FIRST and click on verify.


-> Click on + button to add the details for another member.


-> Double CHECK The Details Before Clicking |VERIFY| Button.


-> AFTER VERIFIED, Click Submit Button.

 -> Leave Team Name as IT IS if going || FOR SOLO ||.

!!! INSTRUCTIONS !!!


-> Enter the Details of ONE member FIRST and click on verify.


-> Click on + button to add the details for another member.


-> Double CHECK The Details Before Clicking |VERIFY| Button.


-> AFTER VERIFIED, Click Submit Button.
